document.full_text: a prosecutor on wednesday compared rod blagojevich to a dirty cop shaking down a motorist for money over a speeding ticket, and told the jury in closing trial arguments that the former illinois governor repeatedly used his power for personal gain.
document.title: blagojevich "flagrantly" violated law, prosecutor says
lines_and_colors: a prosecutor on wednesday compared rod blagojevich to a dirty cop shaking down a motorist for money over a speeding ticket, and told the jury in closing trial arguments that the former illinois governor repeatedly used his power for personal gain.
